body:
Inspired by Adrian G503, I decided to create a thumbnail for anyone who has a youtube channel to use for their videos!

Example:http://imgur.com/96mWhuq
The way you apply is to have these simple requirements,
*what color you want the background
*what item you want on the side
and what color of text you want
So lets start!!!
body_tagged:

title: Youtube Thumbnails for Avicus Youtubers!!!

replies.body:
I'd like mine how the example is. :D

I'd like the background the color of cyan, kinda like cyan wool in Quintus. :D

I'd also like my skin in the middle like the example.

I'd like the Avicus logo on both sides of me. :) http://imgur.com/GlfC38Q

I'd like the text gray, the kinda gray my skin's eyes are.

Also, could the text say Narwhal_Z instead?

Thanks!

-Zach
